tool.name: LabeledEval
tool.description: Evaluation tool for isotope-labeled quantitation experiments.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir truth && ln -s '$truth' 'truth/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $truth.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($truth.ext)' &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && export PYTHONPATH='$__tool_directory__/CTDopts/' && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -truth 'truth/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $truth.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($truth.ext)' | tee '$stdout'
## Postprocessing #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced' and $adv_opts_cond.ctd_out_FLAG && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: mz_tol
param.label: Maximum allowed m/z deviation (divided by charge)

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Evaluation tool for isotope-labeled quantitation experiments.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/UTILS_LabeledEval.html
